item.description:
In the dead of cold, dark winter, our primitive forebears would huddle around a campfire for warmth, telling stories to keep their spirits up. (And no doubt imbibing some warm spirits too!) At our January meetup, we primitive winter bike commuters, along with our perhaps more civilized peers from Portland Green Streets, will carry on the tradition! But don't worry, we'll be inside!!

Bring your best bike-related story or memory: How you got started, why you love cycling, your biggest adventure, your best childhood memory, that time you and your cycling buddy did that really stupid thing, whatever. Purchase a cuppa whatever from Homegrown Herb & Tea and cozy in!

We will try to wrap it up by 8:30.
item.name: Winter Storytelling Circle
